content.text: Let me look for the main source files and understand the project structure:

I can see this appears to be a game project with blue and red colors currently defined. The CSS shows blue (`#7cb7ff`) and red (`#ff7c7c`) variables, and there are stripe patterns using red and blue colors. 

Could you be more specific about which colors you want to change to green and yellow? Are you referring to:

1. The main blue and red theme colors (lines 6-7)?
2. The striped backgrounds (lines 36-76)?
3. The target square color (line 93)?
4. Something else?

Let me also check what this project is to better understand the context:

content.text:
This appears to be a board game project ("ghq") that uses boardgame.io and currently has a red and blue color scheme. 

Since you want to change colors to green and yellow, I'll assume you want to change the main theme colors. Let me update the CSS to use green and yellow instead of blue and red:
Now let me update the striped patterns to use green and yellow instead of red and blue:

edits.old_string: color: #da5f73; /* Color of the Unicode character */
edits.new_string: color: #73da5f; /* Color of the Unicode character */

content.content:
Applied 5 edits to /Users/aidancunniffe/Desktop/ghq/src/app/globals.css:
1. Replaced "/* Red and Blue striped background with wider stri..." with "/* Green and Yellow striped background with wider ..."
2. Replaced "/* Red and Transparent striped background with wid..." with "/* Green and Transparent striped background with w..."
3. Replaced "/* Blue and Transparent striped background with wi..." with "/* Yellow and Transparent striped background with ..."
4. Replaced ".stripe-blue-transparent-sm {
  background: repeat..." with ".stripe-yellow-transparent-sm {
  background: repe..."
5. Replaced "  color: #da5f73; /* Color of the Unicode characte..." with "  color: #73da5f; /* Color of the Unicode characte..."

edits.old_string: color: #da5f73; /* Color of the Unicode character */
edits.new_string: color: #73da5f; /* Color of the Unicode character */

lines: transform: scale(1.2); /* Scale up the element on hover */
-/* Red and Blue striped background with wider stripes */
+/* Green and Yellow striped background with wider stripes */
-    /* Start of blue */ rgb(191, 219, 254) 40px /* Wider blue stripe width */
+    /* Start of yellow */ rgb(254, 254, 191) 40px /* Wider yellow stripe width */
-/* Red and Transparent striped background with wider stripes */
+/* Green and Transparent striped background with wider stripes */
/* Start of transparent */ white 40px /* Wider transparent stripe width */
-/* Blue and Transparent striped background with wider stripes */
+/* Yellow and Transparent striped background with wider stripes */
/* Start of transparent */ white 40px /* Wider transparent stripe width */
/* Start of transparent */ white 12px /* Wider transparent stripe width */
font-size: 30px; /* Adjust the size of the ⌖ character */
-  color: #da5f73; /* Color of the Unicode character */
+  color: #73da5f; /* Color of the Unicode character */
pointer-events: none; /* Ensures the overlay doesn't interfere with clicks */
